May be when quiz mode first time you see a Dialog Box asking something select 'Got it' option. Otherwise you my face problem during quiz 2. When you enter in quiz mode your phone will automatically set to Don't Disturb mode. 3. Your phone power button work as a force quiz submit button during quiz. instruction_4 instruction_5 6. There is no negative marking. Start Quiz All The Best No History Found No Result Found Not Submitted properly
